nodes.text: Godoba, known as Godoba the Hutt and Godoba the Shrewd, was a Hutt crime lord and leader of the Shadow Syndicate on Nar Shaddaa during the Cold War. He decided to support the reconstituted Sith Empire in exchange for a mission from an Imperial spacer against holdings of the Exchange. He was also the owner of the Club Vertica Casino and five city sectors.
